TEXT.TITLE: EQUITABLE LIFE ASSURANCE NAMES UNIT CHIEF
TEXT.BODY: <Equitable Life Assurance Society of the United States> and Hospital Corp of America <HCA> said their Equicor joint venture unit named William Hjorth vice chairman and chief operating officer. Reuter
